verses.verse: And all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%>, and cried <S%H5414><s%>; and the people <S%H5971><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%>.

And all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%>: and the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3863><s%>, Would that we had died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>! or would <S%H3863><s%> that we had died <S%H4191><s%> in this wilderness <S%H4057><s%>!

And wherefore doth Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> us unto this land <S%H776><s%>, to fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>? Our wives <S%H802><s%> and our little ones <S%H2945><s%> will be a prey <S%H957><s%>: were it not better <S%H2896><s%> for us to return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?
And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>, Let us make <S%H5414><s%> a captain <S%H7218><s%>, and let us return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces <S%H6440><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> all the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>, who were of them that spied <S%H8446><s%> out the land <S%H776><s%>, rent <S%H7167><s%> their clothes <S%H899><s%>:

and they spake <S%H559><s%> unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The land <S%H776><s%>, which we passed <S%H5674><s%> through to spy <S%H8446><s%> it out <S%H3966><s%>, is an exceeding good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%>.

If Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> delight <S%H2654><s%> in us <S%H935><s%>, then he will bring us into this land <S%H776><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> it unto us <S%H776><s%>; a land which floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

Only rebel <S%H4775><s%> not against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, neither fear <S%H3372><s%> ye the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; for they are bread <S%H3899><s%> for us <S%H6738><s%>: their defence is removed <S%H5493><s%> from over them <S%H3068><s%>, and Jehovah is with us <S%H3372><s%>: fear them not.

But all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> bade <S%H559><s%> stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones <S%H68><s%>. And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, How long will this people <S%H5971><s%> despise <S%H5006><s%> me <S%H3808><s%>? and how long will they not believe <S%H539><s%> in me <S%H226><s%>, for all the signs which I have wrought <S%H6213><s%> among them <S%H7130><s%>?

I will smite <S%H5221><s%> them with the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, and disinherit <S%H3423><s%> them <S%H6213><s%>, and will make of thee a nation <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier than they <S%H6099><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, Then the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> will hear <S%H8085><s%> it <S%H5927><s%>; for thou broughtest up this people <S%H5971><s%> in thy might <S%H3581><s%> from among them <S%H7130><s%>;

and they will tell <S%H559><s%> it to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this land <S%H776><s%>. They have heard <S%H8085><s%> that thou Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> art in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%>; for thou Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> art seen <S%H7200><s%> face <S%H5869><s%> to face <S%H5869><s%>, and thy cloud <S%H6051><s%> standeth <S%H5975><s%> over them <S%H1980><s%>, and thou goest before <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H5982><s%>, in a pillar of cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>, and in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.

Now if thou shalt kill <S%H4191><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, then the nations <S%H1471><s%> which have heard <S%H8085><s%> the fame <S%H8088><s%> of thee will speak <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Because Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was not <S%H1115><s%> able <S%H3201><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto them <S%H7819><s%>, therefore he hath slain them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.
And now <S%H3581><s%>, I pray thee, let the power of the Lord <S%H136><s%> be great <S%H1431><s%>, according <S%H834><s%> as thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is slow to anger <S%H750><s%>, and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, forgiving <S%H5375><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and transgression <S%H6588><s%>; and that will by no means <S%H5352><s%> clear <S%H5352><s%> the guilty <S%H6485><s%>, visiting the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%>, upon the third <S%H8029><s%> and upon the fourth generation <S%H7256><s%>.

Pardon <S%H5545><s%>, I pray thee <S%H5771><s%>, the iniquity of this people <S%H5971><s%> according unto the greatness <S%H1433><s%> of thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, and according as thou hast forgiven <S%H5375><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>, from Egypt <S%H4714><s%> even until now <S%H2008><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, I have pardoned <S%H5545><s%> according to thy word <S%H1697><s%>:
but in very deed <S%H199><s%>, as I live <S%H2416><s%>, and as all the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>;

because all those men <S%H582><s%> that have seen <S%H7200><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%>, and my signs <S%H226><s%>, which I wrought <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, yet have tempted <S%H5254><s%> me these ten <S%H6235><s%> times <S%H6471><s%>, and have not hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to my voice <S%H6963><s%>;

surely they shall not <S%H518><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>, neither shall any of them that despised <S%H5006><s%> me see it <S%H7200><s%>:

but my servant <S%H5650><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%>, because <S%H6118><s%> he had another <S%H312><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> with him <S%H310><s%>, and hath followed me fully <S%H4390><s%>, him will I bring <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> whereinto he went <S%H935><s%>; and his seed <S%H2233><s%> shall possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

Now the Amalekite <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%>: to-morrow <S%H4279><s%> turn <S%H6437><s%> ye <S%H5265><s%>, and get you into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

How long shall I bear with this evil <S%H7451><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that murmur <S%H3885><s%> against me <S%H8085><s%>? I have heard the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which they murmur against me <S%H3885><s%>.

Say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H2416><s%>, As I live, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, surely as <S%H3808><s%> ye have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in mine ears <S%H241><s%>, so will I do to you <S%H6213><s%>:

your dead bodies <S%H6297><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in this wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; and all that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of you <S%H4557><s%>, according to your whole number, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, that have murmured against me <S%H3885><s%>,

surely ye shall not <S%H518><s%> come <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%>, concerning which I sware <S%H3027><s%> that I would make you dwell <S%H7931><s%> therein <S%H3612><s%>, save Caleb the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>.

But your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, that ye said <S%H559><s%> should be a prey <S%H957><s%>, them will I bring in <S%H935><s%>, and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which ye have rejected <S%H3988><s%>.
But as for you <S%H6297><s%>, your dead bodies shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in this wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And your children <S%H1121><s%> shall be wanderers <S%H7462><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and shall bear <S%H5375><s%> your whoredoms <S%H2184><s%>, until your dead bodies <S%H6297><s%> be consumed <S%H8552><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

After the number <S%H4557><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%> in which ye spied <S%H8446><s%> out the land <S%H776><s%>, even forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, for every day <S%H3117><s%> a year <S%H3117><s%>, shall ye bear <S%H5375><s%> your iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, even forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> my alienation <S%H8569><s%>.

I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have spoken <S%H1696><s%>, surely <S%H518><s%> this will I do <S%H6213><s%> unto <S%H2063><s%> all this evil <S%H7451><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that are gathered together <S%H3259><s%> against me <S%H4057><s%>: in this wilderness they shall be consumed <S%H8552><s%>, and there they shall die <S%H4191><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to spy <S%H8446><s%> out the land <S%H776><s%>, who returned <S%H7725><s%>, and made all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to murmur <S%H3885><s%> against him <S%H3318><s%>, by bringing up an evil report <S%H1681><s%> against the land <S%H776><s%>,

even those <S%H582><s%> men <S%H582><s%> that did bring up <S%H3318><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> report <S%H1681><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, died <S%H4191><s%> by the plague <S%H4046><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

But Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>, remained alive <S%H2421><s%> of those men <S%H1992><s%> that went <S%H1980><s%> to spy <S%H8446><s%> out the land <S%H776><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> mourned <S%H56><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>.

And they rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and gat them up <S%H5927><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Lo <S%H2009><s%>, we are here <S%H5927><s%>, and will go up unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath promised <S%H559><s%>: for we have sinned <S%H2398><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Wherefore now do ye transgress <S%H5674><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, seeing it shall not prosper <S%H6743><s%>?
Go not up <S%H5927><s%>, for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is not among <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H5062><s%>; that ye be not smitten down before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>.

For there the Amalekite <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> are before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H5307><s%>, and ye shall fall by the sword <S%H2719><s%>: because ye are turned <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H310><s%> from following Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, therefore Jehovah will not be with you <S%H3068><s%>.

But they presumed <S%H6075><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%>: nevertheless the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and Moses <S%H4872><s%>, departed <S%H4185><s%> not out <S%H4185><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

Then the Amalekite <S%H6003><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%>, and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> who dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in that mountain <S%H2022><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> them and beat <S%H3807><s%> them down <S%H2767><s%>, even unto Hormah.
